entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wrigley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:30 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -42.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wrigley Airport 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

Pressure: 104.4 kPa
Humidity: 65 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 43. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
